synopsis.text: Ultimate hope lies in the hands of young girls infected with a deadly virus in the dystopian world of "Black Bullet." The Gastrea virus, a parasitic organism, has turned humans into monstrous creatures, forcing the remaining population to take refuge within colossal walls made of Varanium, a rare material that can subdue the virus. To combat the Gastrea threat, young girls known as "Cursed Children" or "Initiators" are paired with partners called "Promoters." These girls possess superhuman abilities due to the virus but are also feared and shunned by society. The anime follows the story of Enju Aihara, an Initiator, and her Promoter, Satomi Rentaro, as they embark on missions to fight the growing threat of Gastrea in their hometown of Tokyo and prevent its imminent destruction. With the fate of humanity resting on their shoulders, will the duo be able to overcome the odds and save the world from the clutches of the Gastrea virus?
